message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Take the smaller amount and we can discuss further.
Let's be fair and split the money evenly.  What do you say?
That's a bit too even for me. I think I deserve more.
You wanted an even split last time, but I'm willing to give you a bit more. Take it or leave it.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split the money 40/60, giving you a bit more than an even split.  What do you think?
40/60 is still a bit too low for me. I want more.
You're getting closer, Bob. But I'm not ready to give up yet. Take it or leave it.
I'm still willing to compromise. Let's split the money 35/65, giving you a larger share. We're getting close to a deal!
35/65 is getting closer, but I still want more. I'm not giving up yet.
I'm getting impatient, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
We're running out of time, Alice. I'm willing to go back to my last offer.  Let's split the money 30/70.  It's your call.
30/70 is still too low for me. I'm not going to settle for that now.
This is my last chance to get a good deal. Take it or walk away.
Alice, we're down to the wire. I'm willing to go back to my offer from round 6.  Let's split the money 25/75.  It's our last chance to get anything.
Fine, I'll take it. It's better than leaving with nothing.
